entry.title: Create k8s POC cluster
entry.summary:
We use Kind(Kubernetes in docker) to help create k8s cluster.
save below file as AspiraSCM-POC.yaml , please update IP address 172.28.24.67 with your host's IP.

kind: Cluster
apiVersion: kind.sigs.k8s.io/v1alpha3
networking:
  apiServerPort: 1900
  apiServerAddress: 172.28.24.67

kubeadmConfigPatchesJson6902:
- group: kubeadm.k8s.io
  version: v1beta2
  kind: ClusterConfiguration
  patch: |
    - op: add
      path: /apiServer/certSANs/-
      value: 172.28.24.67
# 1 control plane node and 3 workers
nodes:
# the control plane node config
- role: control-plane
# the three workers
- role: worker
- role: worker
- role: worker

following (https://kind.sigs.k8s.io/docs/user/quick-start/) to download kind.
create a k8s cluster

# kind create cluster --name AspiraSCM-POC --config ./AspiraSCM-POC.yaml --image kindest/node:v1.16.2
Creating cluster "AspiraSCM-POC" ...
 ✓ Ensuring node image (kindest/node:v1.16.2) 🖼
 ✓ Preparing nodes 📦📦📦📦 
 ✓ Creating kubeadm config 📜 
 ✓ Starting control-plane 🕹️ 
 ✓ Installing CNI 🔌 
 ✓ Installing StorageClass 💾 
 ✓ Joining worker nodes 🚜 
Cluster creation complete. You can now use the cluster with:

#export KUBECONFIG="$(kind get kubeconfig-path --name="AspiraSCM-POC")"
#kubectl cluster-info
Kubernetes master is running at https://172.28.24.67:1900
KubeDNS is running at https://172.28.24.67:1900/api/v1/namespaces/kube-system/services/kube-dns:dns/proxy

download kubectl and get kind-config-AspiraSCM-POC
export KUBECONFIG=./kind-config-AspiraSCM-POC

now we got a k8s cluster with 3 worker nodes.

# kubectl cluster-info                                                                           23:27:39
Kubernetes master is running at https://172.28.24.67:1900
KubeDNS is running at https://172.28.24.67:1900/api/v1/namespaces/kube-system/services/kube-dns:dns/proxy

To further debug and diagnose cluster problems, use 'kubectl cluster-info dump'.
# kubectl get no                                                                                 23:27:47
NAME                          STATUS   ROLES    AGE   VERSION
aspirascm-poc-control-plane   Ready    master   38m   v1.16.2
aspirascm-poc-worker          Ready    <none>   38m   v1.16.2
aspirascm-poc-worker2         Ready    <none>   38m   v1.16.2
aspirascm-poc-worker3         Ready    <none>   38m   v1.16.2
# kubectl get ns                                                                                 23:27:51
NAME              STATUS   AGE
default           Active   38m
kube-node-lease   Active   38m
kube-public       Active   38m
kube-system       Active   38m
